title: NCOC, civic admin sealed, imposed fines on several shops, college in ICT
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 06 (APP):NCOC team and ICT Administration on Wednesday visited hotels, restaurants, shops, markets, private colleges in various areas of Bhara Kahu and Rawat to ensure strict enforcement of obligatory vaccination drive.
NCOC and district administration teams along with police inspected the vaccination status of the students and staffers at a private dental college, hotels, restaurants, shops, and markets in Bhara Kahu and its surroundings.  Assistant Commissioner sealed several shops and imposed heavy fines on violators, and unvaccinated individuals. The team also detained a shop owner, and lodged an FIR against him for facilitating unvaccinated people.
The team also vaccinated single dose of Cansino vaccine to non vaccinated people, shop keepers, and staffers on the spot and strictly advised the masses to complete their vaccination.
Later, NCOC team along with Assistant Commissioner concerned visited Giga Mall and checked the vaccination certificates of the staffers of several shops.  On the occasion, the civic administration sealed various shops and imposed heavy fines for facilitating unvaccinated staffers and customers.  Single shot of Cansino vaccine was also injected to the non vaccinated individuals on the spot.
